entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:53 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -23.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dryden Airport 9:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -23.5°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -25.9°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
